DOC.brief_summary: Berries show improve postprandial glucose insulin response sucrose . During process storage berry product , sucrose invert glucose fructose . The effect berry glycemic response induce inverted sugar know . The purpose study determine whether berry effective lower postprandial glucose insulin response induce inverted sugar .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Berry Nectars Sweetened With Inverted Sugar Post-meal Blood Sugar
DOC.criteria: BMI 2028 kg/m2 Normal fast plasma glucose Smoking Diabetes chronic disease Antibiotic medication within past 3 month Blood donation within past month
